- 3 -
On JUly 31# upon delivery of the intermediate
scripts in final form, delivery of the remaining
5 "English through Poetry" commentaries, and
also completion of items 3#4,5# under II above,
as approved by the AR/CO, USIA will pay to
MA1B the sum of $1500*
On August 31# upon delivery of the scripts
described under II, 6 above, as approved by
the AR/CO, USIA will pay to NAEB the sume of
$1845,
